      • drawSectorCard

        public Card drawSectorCard(Player player,
                  Rules rules)
        Function that activates when the player steps on a Sector. If it's a dangerous sector, return a specific card, or, only if the player is Human and the picked sector is an EscapePodSector (which are available only on AdvancedGameRules) return an EscapePodCard. Return null otherwise
        Parameters:
        player - in which to add an element, rules to be checked when the escapepod is reached
        Returns:
        void

        Returns:
